item.title: ABOUT ME
item.description:
My blogs on other platforms:

CSDN T00ls

爱好广泛、运动方面爱好漂移板、游泳、爬山等。

音乐方面擅长演奏吉他，喜欢摇滚风格音乐，指弹也有所涉猎。

技术方面喜欢web渗透、安全蓝队方面知识。平时偶尔接触SRC漏洞赏金活动，两年前在中国一些平台(漏洞云)获得可观的赏金。

日常活动：steam单机游戏、美剧、看书、弹吉他、撸猫

Hobbies & Interests:

Has a wide range of hobbies, including sports like freeline skating, swimming, and hiking.

Musically inclined, proficient in playing the guitar with a preference for rock music, and has also explored fingerstyle guitar playing.

Technically passionate about web penetration testing and blue team security. Occasionally engages in SRC (Security Response Center) vulnerability bounty programs. Two years ago, earned substantial bounties on Chinese platforms.
